Financial Accounting &amp; Reporting:


	Record all financial transactions (sales, purchases, payments, receipts, and journal entries) in the ERP system on a timely basis
	Prepare monthly bank reconciliations in ERP system
	Assist in the preparation of weekly, monthly, quarterly or yearly management report
	Support inter-company reconciliation with Pacegate Limited &amp; Adipro


Payables &amp; Receivables Management:


	Verify supplier invoices, payment vouchers and related details/documents
	Taking approvals from respective authorized signatories
	Preparation of bank instructions
	Assist in the preparation of weekly debtors report

	Maintain a proper documentation for audit purpose.
	Support in external audit with required documentation.

	Monthly physical stock taking &amp; reconcile raw materials, finished goods, and WIP (Work-in-Progress) data with the production and warehouse teams.

	Support periodic system reconciliations between Tally and eResource ERP during the migration phase.

	Strong knowledge of accounting principles.
	Knowledge of Microsoft Excel and accounting software (Tally / eResource ERP)
	Familiar with Nigerian tax regulations (VAT, WHT, CIT, etc.)
	Ability to work under tight timelines
	Ability to coordinate with other departments.

N200,000 - N250,000 Monthly.
